casebody.data:
April 29, 2002

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-0415. State ex rel. Pepple v. Montgomery.

In Mandamus and Prohibition. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for writs of mandamus and prohibition. Upon consideration of respondents’ motion for stay of discovery pending ruling on motion to dismiss,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of discovery be, and hereby is, granted.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
